question.title: java command line execution giving error when a jar path is included in cmd
question.body:
When we have a java file(Mainclassfile) which has dependency from a jar. Then we generally use below commands to compile and execute it.

javac -cp jar_path.jar Mainclassfile.java

java -cp jar_path.jar Mainclassfile

But for me compile command is working but execute command is throwing below error.

Error: Could not find or load main class Mainclassfile Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Mainclassfile

I tried java -cp .;jar_path.jar Mainclassfile since i am using windows but still same error.

Note: there is only one class in that file and its name is the file names as well.
